TopicTitle: textures for mk1-2 command pod bad

Articles.Content:
I am have a problem with KSP. I have a modded install of 1.04 with 14 mods and module manager 2.6.8. The Mk 1-2 Command pod. The textures are unclear. The textures (as far as I know) have no been modified. Picture will be posted soon(I need to find out how to post pictures from a URL). Mod List:

ActiveTextureManagement

Adjustable Landing Gear

HullCameraVDS

InterstellarFuelSwitch

KAS & KIS

KWRocketry

Infernal Robotics

Mark IV System

Mechjeb2

ModuleAnimateEmissive

Near Future Props

Orbital Portal Tech

Tweak Scale

Edited September 29, 2015 by absprouse
Solved
I didn't think. My graphics were on the lowest setting.
